sentences.en: She went cheerfully about her work.
sentences.cn: 她高高兴兴地做自己的工作。

sentences.en: "We've come with good news," Pat said cheerfully.
sentences.cn: “我们带来了好消息。”帕特高兴地说。

sentences.en: He cheerfully ignored medical advice which could have prolonged his life.
sentences.cn: 他对本可能延长他寿命的医疗建议乐观地置之不理。
